Title: Provides protections for telecommunications tower technicians; repealer
Summary: Provides protections for telecommunications tower technicians, including requiring that all tower technicians performing work pursuant to a contract with a state agency complete training requirements determined by the office of general services prior to commencing work pursuant to such contracts; repeals legislative intent relating to such tower technician protections; relates to the effectiveness thereof.
LawCode: Rpld ยง1, amd ยง3, Chap of 2025; rpld Art 21-C, Lab L; (as proposed in S.2709 & A.4938); add ยง149, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to protections for telecommunications tower technicians; to amend a chapter of the laws of 2025 amending the labor law relating to providing protections for telecommunications tower technicians, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 2709 and A. 4938, in relation to the effectiveness thereof; to repeal certain provisions of a chapter of the laws of 2025 amending the labor law relating to providing protections for telecommunications tower technicians, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 2709 and A. 4938, relating to legislative intent; and to repeal article 21-C of the labor law relating to protections for tower technicians
